overview:
Todd Mazza is Vice President & Chief Technology Officer for Levi Strauss & Co. (LS&Co.). In this position, Todd is responsible for global technology operations, infrastructure & engineering, end user services and technology project management. Todd also develops and oversees the long-term technology strategy for LS&Co.

As VP & CTO, Todd is a member of LS&CO.’s Worldwide IT Leadership Team (WITLT), an executive forum of the company’s senior-most IT management.

Todd was formerly with Decurion Management Company, an LA-based property management company as well as owner and operator of high-end movie theaters across the LA area. Prior to Decurion, Todd managed the global retail and restaurant systems / technology strategy for MGM MIRAGE - a resort and entertainment company out of Las Vegas. Todd also spent ten years at NBC Universal and GE, where he led numerous technology efforts and played key roles on deployments of SAP Supply Chain, master data management, sales & distribution system rollouts and PeopleSoft Financials implementations.

Todd’s earlier experiences were with Gray Communications and Lockheed Martin. Todd is Six Sigma and ITIL certified. He is a graduate of the University of Central Florida.
